mapper.sql: select project_id, project_name,project_zck_id, asset_status, no, borrower, city, loan_bank, contract_principal, principal_balance, interest_balance, principal_interest_balance, guarantor,pledge, collateral,project_manager_id, project_manager, user_id, judicial_status, competent_court, judge_contact, judicial_remarks, collateral_claims, transaction_type, buyer, buyer_id, buyer_sources, buyer_contact, contract_no, limitation_action, seal_up_subject_matter, seal_up_date, limitation_execution, date_filing, first_instance, second_instance, retrial, enforcement_filing_date, appraisal_report_date, first_shot_date, second_shot_date, sell_shot_date, successful_bidder_date, payment_received_date, del_flag, parent_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,project_zck_id,law_firm,lawyer_contact,debt_status from sys_project
mapper.delete: update sys_project set del_flag = '2' where project_id = #{projectId}

update sys_project set del_flag = '2' where project_id in
#{projectId}
mapper.select: where parent_id IS NULL AND del_flag='0' AND project_zck_id = #{projectZckId} ORDER BY no asc
